pluggable.name: Chicklet
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
Morgante Pell
pluggable.description: Fetches various statistics, including FeedBurner subscriber count, and provides modules for displaying statistics.

help.value:
After activating this plugin, these block types will be available for you to use and configure in the 'Areas' of the Theme admin page:

  • Recent Comments

Each one has a template file you can copy to your theme and customize.
